# Media Ready States

**API Collection**

Possible values for the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/htmlmediaelement/1632439-readystate] property.

## Constants

- **HAVE_NOTHING**: No media data is available for playback at the current time.
- **HAVE_METADATA**: Enough of the media resource has been loaded to know the duration, and in the case of a `video` element, the dimensions.
- **HAVE_CURRENT_DATA**: Data for the current playback position is available, but not enough to begin playback.
- **HAVE_FUTURE_DATA**: Enough data is available to begin playback.
- **HAVE_ENOUGH_DATA**: Enough data is available to play at the default playback rate to the end of the media resource without having to pause to rebuffer.
